Detailed Description

This class is used by TaskManagerTP to run a ISystemTask Update method.

See also:
TaskManagerTP

Member Function Documentation

void SystemTaskWrapper::Process ( void   )  [virtual]

This method calls the Update method of the associated ISystemTask with some instrumentation to record the time taken for the call.

Implements WorkItem.

void SystemTaskWrapper::SetStatus ( WorkItem::Status  inStatus  )  [virtual]

TaskManagerTP calls this method to initiate the call to the associated completion fucntion.
